name: Forklift F2P
description:
"Uh, a new Free to Play game.

Let's install it and try it out! What could go wrong?"

- You

Forklift F2P aims to parody the "Free To Play"-Culture by revealing some threats of shady software. 

Prepare yourself for a short adventure with riddles, parodies and eastereggs.

Enjoy!

Contibutors:

  •  Luca 'eisclimber' Dreiling
  • Artur 'exor' Plischke
  • 'mrDock21'
  • Miguel 'ツ coisalegalle' Araújo Nogueira
